description.value:
[Slotless][Generic]

Effect: Thanks to your connection with Venture-Captain Muesello, you have an easier time securing @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinders}. You can purchase wayfinders of up to your character level + 2 as long as you have access to them. If you own a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Standard Wayfinder} (Core Rulebook 617), Muesello offers to upgrade it to a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder} with additional features for the difference in cost between the items.
